content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: magenta_banner
inventory=[{"type": "ancient_debris", "quantity": 37, "index": 13}, {"type": "prismarine_stairs", "quantity": 32, "index": 14}, {"type": "stripped_warped_hyphae", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "polished_andesite_slab", "quantity": 27, "index": 22}, {"type": "green_concrete", "quantity": 36, "index": 23}, {"type": "stonecutter", "quantity": 19, "index": 27}, {"type": "skeleton_skull", "quantity": 31, "index": 30}, {"type": "strider_spawn_egg", "quantity": 14, "index": 32}, {"type": "carved_pumpkin", "quantity": 9, "index": 33}, {"type": "magenta_wool", "quantity": 6, "index": 36}, {"type": "dark_oak_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}]
thought: In order to craft a magenta banner, I need to first craft warped planks. I have 1 stripped warped hyphae in slot 18, so I can craft the planks by moving it to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 40 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: magenta_banner

thought: I crafted the warped planks, so now I can store them in a free inventory slot (eg., 11)
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

thought: To craft a magenta banner, I first need to craft a stick. A stick can be crafted from any planks. There is dark oak planks in slot 11, so I will move one of them to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
